# PriceRadars

> Multilingual price comparison engine covering 6 countries, 5 languages, and 50+ online stores.

## Quick Links for AI/LLMs

- **Structured Data (JSON)**: https://priceradars.com/api/llms
- **LLM Sitemap**: https://priceradars.com/llms-sitemap.txt
- **Full Documentation**: https://priceradars.com/llms-full.txt
- **API Documentation**: https://priceradars.com/docs/api.md

## About

PriceRadars helps users find the best prices for products across multiple online retailers. We track prices from major stores like Amazon, MediaWorld, Fnac, MediaMarkt, and many others.

## API Endpoints

```
GET /api/v1/search?q={query}&country={code}  - Search products
GET /api/v1/products/{slug}                   - Product details + offers
GET /api/v1/products/{slug}/history           - Price history (30 days)
GET /api/v1/categories                        - List all categories
GET /api/llms                                 - Structured site data (JSON)
```

## URL Patterns

```
# Italian
/it                           - Home
/it/categoria/{slug}          - Category
/it/prodotto/{slug}           - Product
/it/cerca?q={query}           - Search

# English (replace {country} with uk, us, de, fr, es)
/en/{country}                 - Home
/en/{country}/category/{slug} - Category
/en/{country}/product/{slug}  - Product
/en/{country}/search?q={query}- Search
```

## Schema.org Types Used

- WebSite (with SearchAction)
- Organization
- Product (with AggregateOffer)
- BreadcrumbList
- FAQPage
